name: Diamond Boss
description:
Enjoy exclusive access to the physical Pixel Boss Club.

* Diamond members have access to use the facilities as your own private club and office. Use it to hot desk, record podcasts, shoot videos, and more...

* Added bonus includes an option to host events at our our club. 

* Visit our Website: [PixelBossClub](https://pixelboss.io/club/)
* Follow us on Twitter: [@PixelBoss_](https://twitter.com/PixelBoss_)
